title: Early Reading Challenge 7: Bedtime story, Beginner readers, Adventure, Animal stories, Teach Values Book, Funny, free story (prime) Rhymes, Fantasy, Education
description: These engaging stories, with lovable characters who are eager to learn and grow, make these easy to read short stories perfect for beginners and anyone looking to relive their childhood. It's a fun series for youngsters, with a simple vocabulary and colorful illustrations, and a length that's just right for a bedtime story.Parents will love the lessons their children learn from these stories!Kids love the funny and lovable characters!Grandparents will enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren!Check it out today and see for yourself.**Click "Buy Now with 1 Click above to reserve your copy **
author: Betty J. Byers
